header.title: Hipervisor <1>Curitiba of Tomorrow</1>
header.subtitle: Upload your own image to see Curitiba re-imagined by AI

footer.text: Developed by Hipervisor / IPPUC. An exploration of AI-driven creativity.

imageGeneration.title: Image Generation
imageGeneration.label: Number of images generated at a time
imageGeneration.description: Choose how many image variations are created with each click of "Re-imagine The Future".

devMode.title: Developer Mode
devMode.label: DEV Mode
devMode.description: When enabled, the app generates mock images locally without using the Gemini API.

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the interface language. Prompts sent to the AI will use the selected language.

scenarioDefaults.title: Scenario Defaults
scenarioDefaults.label: Pre-fill default scenario descriptions
scenarioDefaults.description: When enabled, the 'Optimistic' and 'Pessimistic' scenarios will start with a pre-filled description based on common themes. Disable this if you prefer to start with a blank slate.

scenarioForm.title: Customize Scenarios
scenarioForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the desired aesthetic for the AI...
scenarioForm.newScenarioDescription: A custom description for the new scenario.

imageGenerator.customPromptPlaceholder: e.g., with many pedestrians on the sidewalks, lots of cars on the roads...
imageGenerator.promptError: Add a description to the scenario or a custom prompt to continue.
imageGenerator.refinePlaceholder: e.g., add more people, remove trees...
imageGenerator.refineError: Please describe the changes you want to make.
imageGenerator.refineSelectionError: An image must be generated and selected first to create a variation.

imageUploader.title: 1. Upload image
imageUploader.dragAndDrop: <0>Click to upload</0> or drag and drop

imageDisplay.subtitle: Future: +{{futureYearLabel}} ({{scenarioLabel}}) - Variation {{selectedIndex}}/{{total}}
imageDisplay.placeholder: Your generated image will appear here
imageDisplay.zipError: Could not download all images. JSZip library not found.
imageDisplay.zipCreateError: Failed to create zip file. See console for details.

history.title: Generation History
history.placeholder: The history of your generations will appear here.
history.revertError: Could not restore history (snapshot not found).

maskEditor.title: Magic Edit
maskEditor.promptPlaceholder: Describe what you want to change in the masked area...

Optimistic.description: sustainable architecture, flying electric vehicles, lots of green areas, integrated solar energy, buildings with vertical gardens, futuristic public transport, people riding bikes, clean and visible rivers, holographic lighting, biophilic design

Pessimistic.description: polluted and dense atmosphere, buildings in ruins or abandoned, little vegetation, heavy traffic of old vehicles, excessive neon signs, visible overpopulation, surveillance structures, acid rain, obsolete and broken technology, evident social inequality

apiErrors.unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type: {{type}}. Please upload a PNG, JPG, or WEBP image.
apiErrors.invalidApiKey: Invalid API key. Please ensure it is configured correctly.
apiErrors.quotaExceeded: API quota exceeded. Please check your plan and billing details.
apiErrors.badRequest: Bad request. The provided image may be unsupported, corrupt, or the prompt may be too long.
apiErrors.serviceUnavailable: The AI service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
apiErrors.generationFailed: No image was generated. The model may have refused the request due to safety policies.
apiErrors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

prompts.initial: Photorealistic re-imagination of this cityscape image from Curitiba, Brazil. Project it {{year}} years into the future, adopting a {{scenarioLabel}} perspective. Focus on architectural changes, technological integration, and environmental aspects. {{scenarioDescription}}. Please also incorporate these specific user-requested details: "{{customPrompt}}".
prompts.refineWithText: This is a photorealistic, futuristic image of Curitiba, Brazil, in a {{scenarioLabel}} scenario. The original creation was guided by this description: "{{customPrompt}}". Generate a new version of this image that incorporates this specific modification: "{{modificationPrompt}}". It's crucial to maintain the established futuristic {{scenarioLabel}} aesthetic, focusing on architecture, technology, and environment.
prompts.refineWithMask: You are an expert photo editor. Use the second image as a mask on the first image. The white area of the mask indicates the region to be modified. Apply the following instruction ONLY to the masked region: "{{prompt}}". The rest of the image must remain unchanged. Return only the complete, edited image.
